A4.text: His awards and achievements include eleven NBA championships with the Boston Celtics in thirteen seasons, two of which were won as player-coach, and he is credited with having raised defensive play in the NBA to a new level.

A5.text: The Celtics went on to win their first NBA championship in 1957 and won an NBA record eight consecutive championships from 1959 to 1966.
